comments:
When switching from the resource view to the Java view, I get the message "An

The problem seems to be independent from a particular project or so.

Forgot to mention that it happens with F3. Also, maybe "independent of a 
particular project" is a bit vague. Actually it happens for all of my projects.

Looking at the code, the only possible NPE is in 
ITextEditor#getSelectionProvider() which does not claim to return null. Adding 
Nick as CC for comment.
Adding Kai as CC for comment.
AbstractTextEditor can return null for the selection provider.

The comment on ITextEditor#getSelectionProvider() should indicate that null can 
be returned.

ManageBreakpointActionDelegate handles the case of the text editor not yet 
having a selection provider.

Please verify (Jared).

Verified null handling. Have we opened a bug report against UI for the 
ITextEditor#getSelectionProvider API problem?
